other_tests.findings: Loss of heterozygosity of STK11 in Sertoli cells, absence of LKB1 immunofluorescence, increased aromatase expression, low p21 expression, and decreased phosphorylation of AMPK.
Abnormal cords with thickened basement membranes, increased Sertoli cells, and heterogeneous aromatase staining.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Annual testicular ultrasound findings did not change significantly over the follow-up period of 6 years.

other_tests.findings: A heterozygous mutation in STK11 (910delC) was identified.
Enlarged testes (3.5 mL on the right and 2.8 mL on the left), and microlithiasis identified.
